website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an alternative to traditional floating candles, these LED battery-powered tealights offer long-lasting burn times without the risk of burns.
pros: A generous pack of 24 tealights that operate with batteries
Candles earn praise for offering long battery life and produce an inviting glow that flickers like real flames
A good option for windy days
cons: A few reports of occasional "duds" upon arrival
On the small side, and some consumers wish they were a bit larger

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I felt like an ass because several of us took these apart looking for a way to turn them on. What I learned was that these little lights are invincible! We disassembled them, dropped parts, reassembled them & they still ALL still worked once we realized that we only had to put them into water lol. They arrived quickly & work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Revised review due to company's concern
customer_reviews.text: I previously rated it as a 2 star due to only receiving 22 and of the 22 only 21 worked. The company contacted me and wanted to make things right, which they did. My wife and I couldn't be happier with them. What a great company to buy from. My wife loves them floating in our pool at night.
customer_reviews.author: John Cueny

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two boxes of these lights, both “warm white”, at separate times. The lights in the first box are almost yellow but I thought I would just live with it. I decided I needed more so I ordered another box. These lights are a perfect bright white! Which is the only reason I’m giving as many stars as I am. Now I’m sending back the first box to gamble and hopefully get another box with the perfect white light. This company should be a lot more consistent!!! The lights are completely different and I cannot use them together!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Sermons

customer_reviews.title: Stays lit for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I bought two packages of these for my wedding. I tested one out in a glass of water to see how long it stays lit and it has been going strong for 43 hours now and is still lighting up in the water! I like that to turn them on you just place them in the water. There isn't a bunch of tags you have to pull out and then do a switch to turn it on. The water activates it. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa

customer_reviews.title: They look real!
customer_reviews.text: Used these candles in my wedding and candles in centerpiece vase that fills up with water. Was super romantic and looked real in photo/video. If your saving for your wedding or on a budget this is definitely something you should have on your list. These candles lasted more than 6 hours. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Samersaadi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in a centerpiece
customer_reviews.text: I filled a very large, smooth/fluted, clear crystal bowl with inexpensive colored & white imitation pearls. Then I added water & put these floating “candles” (see pic) on the surface. It was really beautiful as a centerpiece for our Christmas dinner table. The candles were a bit temperamental & one didn’t work at all. But once I got them actually lit on the water it was splendid! We had 5 candles on the surface. Two for our daughters, two for my husband & me, & one in the center to represent the unity of our family. It was a real hit with our guests too! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Songsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly! Turned on when they hit the water & turned off when taken out... magic! : ) They made lovely centerpieces floating in tall glass cylinders with greenery.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Some of them need new batteries even though they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of them need new batteries even though they are new. Oh well. Otherwise they work exactly as described and came on time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great tea lights
customer_reviews.text: I just received these today and did not know how to turn these tea lights on until I read a review from another customer. The only way to turn them on is to float them in water. Love the color and ambience of these tea lights. Since I just received them today,, I don't know about the longevity.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN RENEE OLIVER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in centerpieces
customer_reviews.text: Used in centerpieces for our wedding. They turned out so well and I absolutely will use them again to add to decor when hosting parties or even an elegant dinner at our home!! Very awesome and multi useful!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great little lights
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect. Floated them in the pool for a birthday party. They lasted all night.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I felt so stupid!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like to admit it, but I couldn’t figure out how to make these go on to save my life! There was just no obvious way to complete the electrical circuit. Man, I tried everything and there were zero directions in any language! I felt so stupid! Okay, so the trick is to put it in water. Just set it in it’s little lantern float and drip some water in the bottom and bam! Ya got lights!
customer_reviews.author: Karman Vega

customer_reviews.title: These are so cool!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize the water is what activates them to turn on! There are two metal dots on the bottom, and something that conducts an electric current has to touch both at once for them to turn on. This could you and your thumb, or the water itself. Float great, look great! Just don't buy them unless you're planning on floating them, they don't work dry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.text: This little lights are amazing. Will be using for my sons wedding. Will update on longevity and guest reactions. I’m personally very happy with quality, looks, brightness, and ease to use. The lights were put into water at 5:45 it was 11:30 and they were still shining brightly. Everyone was amazed. Will definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting candles.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a beachside, outdoor wedding. They were a lifesaver! I bought these just in case the real candles wouldn’t stay lit and they didn’t. These battery operated candle were turned on at 3:00 p.m. and we’re still lit at midnight. I tried them after the wedding and they still worked. I look forward to using them throughout the year for holiday centerpieces and parties.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Eason

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. I have an event coming up and needed a specific count of floating candles. I opened and immediately tested all candles. 4 out of 24 didn’t t work. So I took the non working ones apart and found that the batteries weren’t installed correctly. They are all working and I am a happy camper. I have used these from a local retailer and pay $7.00 for 4 candles. This is a great value. Just be sure to test them before you use them. They received a 4 star because I had to spend time taking them apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases from Amazon. These lights were used for my centerpieces and for my ceremony. They worked all night long and were still going strong the next morning when I went to clean up my reception hall. These lights are activated by water and I really loved that.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great candles super bright
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product for the easy of use and they are really bright. My only issue is that about 5 of them will now not turn off. However the company was super about fixing the defect! Love them and will use again and again. My friends just ordered them too.
customer_reviews.author: K Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Tighten first.  Worked beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: They all lit. Only one had trouble turning off, so I unscrewed the base, took the battery out and put it back in. I tightened the base of all of them first before using them, as per someone's review. I bought the yellow flame color. I really enjoyed them floating in my bath that I used a bath bomb in. They cast a candle light glow in my tub. I'm waiting for floating flowers I ordered to put in the bath with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mer3

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: Love it will buy more. I use it for my daughter 15th birthday party. I use it as a centerpiece I put them in water starting at 6 till 12 and they was still on.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice looking in my pool. They do get water in it eventually. But for price and beauty it's worth it. Customer service was superb. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ckc

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR CENTERPIECE DISPLAY
customer_reviews.text: They float great! They light up as soon as they hit the water" We have used them for 2 separate occasions and that is a total of 10 hours and still the batteries are going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just got them so don’t know about longevity yet I don’t even know what thickness means for review, however, they are really cool and look great (so far) floating in water.
customer_reviews.author: Cool

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Only tried one an it works so I'll see when I'm ready to used them. At first was trying to figure if i had to press a button then i just put it in some water an it came right on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! First time buying and I'm glad I ordered 2 cases because I fell in love with them and I feel that the price is right for these. They are still pretty bright in daytime and that's exactly what I needed since the event will be around 2pm. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Karen E.

customer_reviews.title: No fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I have autistic grandchild. I have no worries. Just water lights them up. Dry after use and they shut off. God for approx 100 hours ...... maybe a little Lea. But love these.
customer_reviews.author: gimberly

customer_reviews.title: Lghts
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy. They stay on for 3 minutes then they turn rusty just being in the water. Don’t stay lighted. DON’T BUY
customer_reviews.author: Nonya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for any party!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for New YEars Eve and they were soooo cool! They lasted at least 2 days afterward. Cannot be used except in water as that is the only way to turn the light on to be floating in water.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper wax
customer_reviews.text: These were nice but burned through rather quickly as it was made of a cheap wax that melted very fast. They did the job though and they looked pretty. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for days going strong
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, nice flickering to make them more "life-like" and lasted for days!

customer_reviews.title: Homory lights review
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun! They light up the minute they hit the water and are great for any event or patio party.

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughters wedding. They have a great glow and they last forever! I left some in water for over two weeks and they were still glowing. Super great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: L.Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Best flickering flame and excellent longevity
customer_reviews.text: Love the natural flickering, honest looks like a real candle. Every flame I received over 2 mo ago still working every evening.

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved these waterproof candles. Just fill up your candle holder with water, drop these in and they automatically light with the touch of water. Super easy . I’m very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. O

customer_reviews.title: You should buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: very nice! Worked great and floated perfectly! Stayed lit for the whole wedding!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof mini led candles
customer_reviews.text: I like that they work a described.however,the battery runs low quick.therefore,you probably shouldn't keep it on all day.
customer_reviews.author: kcanel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and worth buying:)
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful in my decorative piece on dining table! Lasts long and worth buying:)
customer_reviews.author: Regular customer

customer_reviews.title: Better then having to light candles
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome. Will review after party. I did test them all and they all work!!
customer_reviews.author: serra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my baby shower table set up. It made the table light up nice and slightly dim. Perfect. I put it in the vases with water. perfect. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! Perfect! Just drop them in water and they light right up. How unique!! I need to buy more just because. Theyblast the entire night of the party, 4 hours, and still light up.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Nice ambiance, easy to use, float well. Solid purchase, no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and glows for days.
customer_reviews.text: Tossed this little guys in the pool for a evening wedding. They glowed on into the next day and found 3 more in pool filter still glowing after 3 days. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: The style is nice but only last about 5 hours

customer_reviews.title: Cool candles!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed by these! They last a long time too! I got these instead of real candles so my niece and nephews wouldn’t burn themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: LONGLASTING
customer_reviews.text: The candles arrived on time and intact. They were smaller than I expected but they still looked pretty floating in the pool. We used them for my sister's backyard wedding. When I took them out of the pool the next morning several of them were still lit.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Venues that don’t allow open flames.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT !!!
customer_reviews.text: They look great in a pond, pool, tub and for entertaining! THEY WORK!!!

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: just as shown
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to use and will work perfectly for our wedding table decor. You just drop them into a vase of water and they turn on. when you pull them out they turn off. EASY
customer_reviews.author: Suza987

customer_reviews.title: perfect float
customer_reviews.text: I bought these candles for my wedding but had to test them out first. It was the perfect size that I needed for my vase and they float really well. They last about 4-6 hours and the wax doesn’t melt everywhere. Really happy with them.

customer_reviews.title: Happy they work!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for putting batteries in them. They come ready to go. Not all Tea light candles do. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Simple.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little confused at first. I thought they were broken. All I had to do was float on water and they lit up. I used for centerpieces and they were beautiful and so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Love these floating lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these floating lights!! They work well and float well. Definitely a good purchase. Would recommend and purchase again if I need more.

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful

customer_reviews.title: fun decoration for poolside party
customer_reviews.text: turn off the filter pump and float these in the pool for night time poolside gathering -- turn filter pump back on, and they are easy to retrieve from the skimmer baskets when the night is done.

customer_reviews.title: Lights up my bedroom

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for floating in a candle holder or floating in a pond..I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.text: I love these and wish I had purchased more..I used them for a wedding in the pond at night and they looked absolutely stunning..the kids enjoyed tossing them in the water and watching them light up.

customer_reviews.title: Great product it’s worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I put one in water in came on right away. I left it in the water for a day and a half. It stayed on the whole time!

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price

customer_reviews.title: Some of the lights did'nt work

customer_reviews.text: I bought these to place in my fountain in my entryway....they were SO pretty! Each of my guests that evening complimented on how beautiful they looked...

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candlelight pond
customer_reviews.text: These lit up instantly upon hitting the pond water. It was like a floating light festival. Haven't had them long enough to speak about longevity but they turn off quickly when removed.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome candles for pool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome used these for my wedding and they worked great! Just put them in a pool and they instantly work.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These candles actually stayed lite for 10 hrs and burned evenly. Will buy again

customer_reviews.title: Best value, awesome lights!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tealights! Bright! Easy to turn on, just pop them in the water and then they turn off when you take them out! I’ve already ordered a second set I love them so much!

customer_reviews.text: Work perfectly at my 50th birthday party. They lasted the six hours and beyond. Thanks!

customer_reviews.text: We put these candles in a small clear cup and put them on our food table. They looked gorgeous and added class to our wedding. One candle stopped working after only three hours?

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wedding centerpieces.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my centerpiece at my wedding. They were perfect and even flicker like a real candle. Two of them did not work, but I had more then enough. Very happy with this product!

customer_reviews.text: These really work like advertised! They turn on when they touch the water and go off instantly when you pull them out of water. We'll see how long they lasted, but as of now they are great!

customer_reviews.title: No need to worry about wind
customer_reviews.text: These little guys are great! Used for an outside wedding and didn't have to worry about wind blowing out the flame. They flicker like real candles!

product_meta.title: Homemory 24PCS Waterproof LED Lights LED Flameless Flickering Tealight Candles Battery Operated for Wedding, Party, Bathroom, Pool, SPA - Amber Yellow
feature_bullets: Fantastic & 100% Waterproof: Homemory floating tealights (D1.5" X H1.6") are completely waterproof. Put these amber yellow light led tealight candles in your pool and vase or bowls filled with water to create a warm and romantic ambiance. Package includes 24 x floating tealights (batteries installed).

Energy Saving & Convenient Operation: Homemory waterproof flameless tea lights are powered by CR2032 batteries. Fun floating candles that work through the conduction of the water! As soon as they touch the water they come on and go off when they are taken out. Please make sure that the bottoms are all tightened before use.

Smoke-Free & Zero Carbon Emission: These LED tea lights can be used without having to worry of flame, absolutely no fire hazards or burning risks, no hot and dirty wax to deal with. Safe for families with pet(s) or young child(ren).

Perfect For Any Occasion: Floating tealight candles are suitable for decorating various events, creating a romantic and relaxing ambiance. Perfect addition for both indoor and outdoor occasions, eg. in SPA, bathroom, restaurants, wedding, party, and festival decorations.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee - Homemory provides 100% satisfied service and guarantee. All the battery operated floating tealights are thoroughly and rigorously tested and sold exclusively by Homemory. Any problem please feel free to contact us. We will offer you satisfactory solutions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars930 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
